name: A Miner Extraction
description:
A Miner Extraction is a simple endless runner made for Miziziziz's Chain Letter Jam. This was my game inspired by Poly Mars' Swangman, thank you for the nomination!

Notes:

  • Yes I know the WebGl build has some visual issues compared to the downloadable version but shush

How To Play:

  • Simply press A or D to start and avoid as many obstacles as possible

I hope you enjoy the terrible music, bad art, and crappy WebGl build! Remember to share your best scores in the comments :)

#ChainLetterJam

If nominated, you have two weeks to make a 1 minute game in some way inspired by the game that nominated you.

Once finished, put #ChainLetterJam in your game description, a link to the game that nominated you, and then nominate two other devs (or less or more, whatever, this isn't a chain letter where you die in three days if you don't).
